title: The most cat and dog friendly states in the US
contentencoded:
This final note today, just because we didn't get enough about cats with Ben Lashes. As seems appropriate after an interview like that, we're gonna quote Buzzfeed.

They crunched data from the American Veterinary Medical Association, and came up with a list of most cat-friendly and dog-friendly states in the country.

Louisiana and Alabama are the top two dog-loving/cat-hating states. Maine and Vermont go for cats over dogs by the biggest margin.
description: Does your home state prefer the companionship of canines or cats?
